text: Gearóid Iarla (1335disappeared 1398), also known as Gerald FitzMaurice FitzGerald was the 3rd Earl of Desmond, lord of Munster, and a Norman-Gaelic poet. He disappeared in 1398, at the age of 62 or 63. == Biography == He was born in 1335, as the child (son) of Maurice FitzGerald, 1st Earl of Desmond. When he grew up, he became the 3rd Earl of Desmond, lord of Munster, and a Norman- Gaelic poet. He disappeared in 1398, at the age of 62 or 63. Category:1335 births Category:Monarchs in Europe Category:14th century in Europe
title: Gearóid Iarla
